Content: Higher FPS just means a smoother experience for the player which can increase those. It only gives the benefit of being able to react better.
Apex’s issue is due to their server tickrate. It tries to give you a high tick rate but falls to 30% of its max due to inefficient data transfer.
It’s not FPS dependent but rather the server not knowing how to handle different loads and ping properly.
First video says what I was saying about it being correlation not causation.
Second video is a pubg issue
That is explicitly false and a big claim
